member.name: IAsyncInfo.Cancel
member.summary: Requests cancellation of the asynchronous operation already in progress.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IAsyncInfo.Close
member.summary: Closes the asynchronous work object. Call this method after the results of the operation have been consumed but before calling .
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Retrieves the termination status of the asynchronous operation.
Retrieves the termination status of the asynchronous operation.
Retrieves the identifier of the asynchronous operation.
Retrieves the identifier of the asynchronous operation.
Gets a value that indicates the status of the asynchronous operation.
